welcomeTitle: Welcome to Majestic Villa Lidija by Irundo
welcomeText: We love to have you as our guest! Relax and enjoy your stay at Majestic Villa Lidija - your private Dubrovnik retreat.
arrivalIntro: Everything you need for a smooth arrival.
access1: The villa is in a residential zone and not directly accessible by car.
access2: Nearest drop-off point: View Drop-off Point.
access3: Follow pedestrian path and steps to the villa entrance.
access4: If needed, porter service is available — please let us know in advance.
entrance1: Keypad located on the right side of the entrance gate.
entrance2: Enter the code sent to you on your arrival day.
entrance3: Keep the door securely closed when not in use.
parking1: Private parking spot in a nearby garage.
parking2: There are steps to reach the villa.
parking3: If you need assistance with luggage, request porter service in advance.
arrivalTip: Please contact your host at least 1 hour before arrival so she can greet you personally and assist with access.
aboutIntro: A short overview of your villa and its amenities.
aboutMain: Welcome to Majestic Villa Lidija, where comfort meets elegant simplicity. Located in the heart of Dubrovnik, the villa offers breathtaking views of the Adriatic and easy access to cultural landmarks, beaches, and restaurants.
aboutList1: Sea-view living room with terrace and infinity pool
aboutList2: Fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances
aboutList4: 3 bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms, double beds, and Smart TVs
aboutList5: Sauna in the top-floor master bedroom
aboutList6: Private gym and additional bathroom on the ground floor
aboutList7: High-speed Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and floor heating
guideIntro: Useful information for appliances, amenities, and comfort.
waterText: Tap water is drinkable. Hot water is supplied automatically from the boiler in the basement.
coolingText: Ceiling air conditioners with TOSHIBA thermostat. Use power button and adjust temperature with + / – buttons.
heatingText: Floor heating — adjust temperature on the thermostat in each room.
tvText: Press Home → select TV or other app. Smart TVs in all rooms.
saunaText: Located in top-floor bedroom. Press power to switch on/off. Shower before use. Stay hydrated. Limit sessions to 10–15 minutes.
poolText: Infinity pool cleaned automatically. Shower before use, supervise children.
addonsIntro: Enhance your stay with our curated services.
localIntro: Practical links and resources for exploring Dubrovnik.
tipTransportText: Check road updates and find your way around the city.
tipExploreText: Discover beaches, restaurants, bars and local shops.
tipServicesText: Everything you might need during your stay.
contactIntro: We’re always available for your comfort.
departureIntro: Before you leave, a few reminders for a smooth check-out.
departure2: Contact your host a day before departure to arrange check-out time
departure3: Luggage storage or porter service available on request
